sentences.sContent: After taking the drug, several patients suffered memory lapses (= when you cannot remember something for a short time ).
sentences.sCn: 若干病人服用此药后记忆短暂丧失。

synos.tran: 失效；流逝；背离，失检；陷入

words.tran: 失效的；堕落的；转归他人的
陷入（lapse的过去分词）；流逝；结束

trans.tranCn: 失误, 下降, 流逝, 丧失, 过失
trans.tranOther: a short period of time during which you fail to do something well or properly, often caused by not being careful
